name: commits_by_week
description: The number of commits made each week in the repository.

dimensions.name: committed_week
dimensions.description: The week when the commit was made, starting from the first day of the week.

measures.name: weekly_commit_count
measures.description: The total number of commits made each week.

sample_questions: Number of commits made by week
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT oid, DATE_TRUNC('week', committed_date) AS committed_week FROM commits.commits
